resources.string: Tap the sun icon to activate night mode.
Night mode will automatically disable at %s.
If you find this app useful, would you mind leaving a rating?
No permission is needed. But it cannot dim lockscreen, status bar or navigation bar. And it doesn\'t work in Android 7.0.
Recommended mode. It is stable, although it cannot dim navigation bar and prevent user from clicking \"Install\" or \"Allow\" in permission dialog.
You can dim both status bar and navigation bar. However, it may make screen flashing in some apps.
Since Android Oreo (8.0), system strictly limits the permission of floating window. Old methods were no longer available. Maybe we will support better methods to control brightness in the future.
Author: Paper Airplane Dev - Fung Gwo

"Night Screen can help protect you from the harm of strong light at night.
Some devices' lowest brightness is still high so we can make it lower by creating a mask on screen.

If you want to support this application, you could send some money to my Alipay: fythonx\@gmail.com"

Github Repo: https://github.com/fython/Blackbulb
My blog: http://feng.moe
My sina weibo: @某烧饼
Paypal: https://www.paypal.me/fython
Logo Designer: Google+ Youlun Zhai

Enabling this can mask the top of screen, but it may need a permission on some devices (such as MIUI and Android 6.0)\nIf it doesn\'t work on the first try, please allow this app to show system alert windows.
Failed to start mask. Please check whether the system has denied the permissions.
Can you see this message? If you can, Night Screen is working well.\nIt will automatically stop after 5 seconds if you don\'t press OK.
Click here to open settings or Swipe to stop Night Screen
Please allow the app to run in background by clicking settings if auto mode does not work for you.
